columns.sql: select s1.d, sessionnum, whole from (select s.id as session_id, cast(s.startdatetime as date) as d from sessions s order by d) s1 left join (select session_id, sessionnum, sum(whole) as whole from sessions s join inoutgsm i on s.id = i.session_id where s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 group by session_id, sessionnum) s2 on s1.session_id = s2.session_id where s1.d >= cast(:startdatetime as date) and s1.d <= cast(:enddatetime as date)

columngroup.title: azs
columngroup.sql: select name as groupname, code as groupparam from stations order by code

columns.sql: select s2.whole, s2.summ from (select s.id as session_id, cast(s.startdatetime as date) as d from sessions s order by d ) s1 left join (select s.id as id, sum(i.whole) as whole, sum(summ) as summ from sessions s join inoutgsm i on i.session_id=s.id where s.azscode=:groupparam and s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 group by s.id ) as s2 on s1.session_id = s2.id where s1.d >= cast(:startdatetime as date) and s1.d <= cast(:enddatetime as date)

select whole from (select s.id as session_id, cast(s.startdatetime as date) as d from sessions s order by d ) s1 left join (select session_id, sum(whole) as whole from sessions s join inoutgsm i on s.id=i.session_id where s.azscode=:groupparam and s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 and payment_code='01БС00' group by session_id) s2 on s1.session_id = s2.session_id where s1.d >= cast(:startdatetime as date) and s1.d <= cast(:enddatetime as date)
